phrases: Looks like we managed to break through the blockade.
I wish he would hurry up and fill us in on the next part of the plan.
That boy always waits until the last second to tell
W-What on earth are you wearing?!
I am broiling in this thing!
This is not your private space!
You know she has the same last name as Satomi, right?
Akira-chan, we want to thank you for coming with us.
How about showing us your face?
You cannot interact through texting forever, you know?
If you want to talk to Akira, you will do it through me.
But we are pilots who fight side by side, so why will not she...
It is my duty to keep Akira safe.
Do we have to go through you even then?
So we are starting an operation to retake JIOR!
This is a force recon, remember?
Do not go changing the plan.
Come on, they are pretty much the same thing.
Descents to Earth are conducted using Follow Rings.
If we borrow a drop shuttle in the entrance space and dock with it,
all we have to do is follow instructions and proceed down the rings.
So basically, all we have to do is dive down through those rings, right?
Guidance inside the ring is handled automatically, so even a
bunch of amateurs should not have a problem.
The one thing that worries me is that you need clearance for a drop.
All this stuff is over my head, so I will leave it to you.
For now, all we can do is fight.
It may be a curse, but it is also a power that we need.
I am having trouble swallowing that.
I am telling you, I saw her myself!
The only ultra-hot girl recluses are the two-dimensional kind.
Is not the fact that Unit 6's pilot is the
legendary Little Witch like something out of a dream?
Do you think that legend is true?
That she hacked the entrance exam to
the national university's high school affiliate?
We are not talking about some S-class security level here.
If she really did that, she would be a god.
I guess that was the because...
I cannot believe that hacker was your little sister.
Why do you coddle her so much?
Her own actions led her to be
so she brought it all on herself.
What do you know about it?!
Everybody tells me that my food does not
look very appetizing, but trust me, it is delicious!
But putting soy-pickled vegetables on wafers is a bit strange.
Take my word for it and give it a try!
There is all kinds of pickled vegetables,
but the ones I recommend are the traditional JIOR Kurumaya recipe!
They are a thing of beauty!
They are great with dinner, but they are so good
that I figured they could be used with snacks!
They are awesome with picked veggies on them.
Shoko asked me to look out for you.
She said you are a good person, but not used to people.
You are friends with Shoko, right?
That makes you friends with me, then.
The friend of my friend is my friend.
I bet that is what Shoko would say.
H-He never tried to help me then, so why try to now?
Just be happy you have some.
If you do not have any, you cannot even be sad.
When we reach JIOR... reach Earth,
will I be able to remember anything?
You are pretty as a picture, Highness!
Why do not you get a little exercise yourself, Q-vier?
He is been playing hooky all day!
He is this total straight-arrow with bobbed hair.
You always sound like you are having fun!
How has that boy with glasses been lately?
What was the title of that movie you were talking about?
Can you take me someplace with a view of the ocean?
Would the beach be too public?
Or would a secluded place be better?
To have a private conversation, I mean.
Is not that why you have been tailing me since this morning?
Why do not I call in that rain check?
Why do not we get some tea?
Handing off to Follow Ring guidance.
You are cleared to enter port.
Let us see, this one's an unscheduled.
What was the story with those unscheduled passengers?
It looks like it went according to plan.
A passenger liner bound for New Guinea
and three JIOR Mail Steamer cargo ships...
This one is a private jet, huh?
To disguise our landing time, the cargo ships would be best.
You can make out all of that?
That is always been your field of expertise, has not it?
It is a match for the spacecraft that launched from Module 77!
Do not let them land on Earth!
If our communications frequency is detected,
You are saying that I did this?
I thought you said there would not be any combat!
Securing the ship's flight path has top priority.
If we leave the rings, our descent will fail!
A holding action until we begin reentry, huh?
Do not let them near the ship.
Assume that if we take a single hit, it is all over.
All units, do not stray too far from the ship!
That is a whole lot of warnings!
Hey, one came at us from underneath!
The one below us is a special-spec Ideal.
Brother, I brought you some rice porridge.
But you have a terrible fever!
Whether or not I get into the best school
I cannot take any time off.
Anything other than a national school is unthinkable!
Will you be one of the winners?
Or will you end up a loser?
It is no use, my heat levels are almost critical!
What are we supposed to do?!
I cannot take much more of this!
I will go down there and beat the crap out of him!
If you go any further from the ship and cannot return,
your heat levels will max out in no time.
Why is that guy working just fine?!
They are modified versions that have been attached
As long as that is not destroyed, they are capable of unassisted reentry.
You are all nearly maxed out.
Even if I do, we are history if we take one hit, remember?!
Sure, once I take this guy out!
The other one's coming in for another pass!
It is just this one, but it is good to go!
Care to try out a Familiar?
He destroyed it in one blow!
We will begin reentry any moment.
Unit 6 is too far away from the ship.
It is too late to save her.
It is like that other time all over again!
Why did I go and do that?
No matter what I did, he would never...
JIOR National University High Schoo l 66th Annual Entrance Exam Sheet
I would like to ask you a few questions, if you do not mind.
I see here that you are scheduled to take the exam today.
You did not ask her to hack into the exam test sheet, did you?
I do not understand why she would do such a thing, either.
It is not like he cares if I live or die anyway.
What do you think you are doing?
I cannot stand by and watch one of us die!
It is not compatible with aftermarket parts?
If we override our trajectory now, this ship will burn up too!
So you are just going to let her die?!
If I let this chance pass by,
when will I ever get another to make things right with Akira?
This time, I am going to protect her!
These are... ground control radio transmissions?
It means that even if this ship veers off course,
we would still be able to make reentry if we locked onto one of these.
She is calling out to me!
Pick out appropriate guidance from that mess?
I cannot make out anything they are saying!
Alter heading... to 10 of the clock, 40 minutes.
I will call out the instructions!
I want you to take the ship's controls!
You want me to jeopardize everything just to save your little sister?
If we do nothing, it will mean losing two Valvraves.
Would not that throw a wrench in your plans?
Leaders have to be prepared to show a firm hand.
You need Haruto's abilities, do not you?
make the reentry work even after we go off course.
You are the only one with the skill to do that.
I will not turn a deaf ear.
All this time, I have pretended not to hear you.
I will not hide from it anymore!
The crime and the punishment, we will take them on together!
Units 1 and 6 are aboard the shuttle!
Where did you set us down?
Next time, episode 15, Return to Karlstein.
The system that will expose the truth of the world.
